zh.name: @Lance
zh.bio: 全端工程師，擅長前端與後端多種技術，樂於挑戰新事物。

portfolio.title: 購物網站
portfolio.desc: 前後端獨立開發，支援商品瀏覽、購物車、金流、會員系統等功能。

portfolio.title: Web POS
portfolio.desc: 基於網頁的POS系統，整合即時庫存與銷售報表，刷卡、LINE Pay、街口支付付款，電子發票。

en.name: @Lance
en.bio: Full-stack engineer proficient in both frontend and backend technologies, always eager to take on new challenges.

portfolio.title: Shopping Website
portfolio.desc: Developed both frontend and backend; features include product browsing, cart, payment, and member system.

portfolio.title: Web POS
portfolio.desc: Web-based POS system with real-time inventory and sales reports, supports credit card, LINE Pay, JKOPAY payments, and e-invoice.
